text: "Nadine" also know as Nadine (Is That You?) is a 1964 song by Chuck Berry. It was his first single following his release from prison in October 1963. It went to number 23 in the United States and number 27 in the United Kingdom. It has been recorded by numerous artists over the years. == References == Category:1964 songs Category:Chuck Berry songs Category:Waylon Jennings songs Category:Dion DiMucci songs Category:George Thorogood songs Category:Dire Straits songs Category:Mot√∂rhead songs
title: Nadine (song)
